question: The sequence of communities of primary succession in water is
choices: Phytoplanktons -> Scrubs -> Free floating hydrophytes -> Rooted hydrophytes -> Grasses -> Trees
Phytoplanktons -> Free floating hydrophytes -> Rooted hydrophytes -> Trees -> Scrubs
Free floating hydrophytes -> Scrubs -> Phytoplanktons -> Rooted hydrophytes -> Grasses -> Trees
Phytoplanktons -> Rooted hydrophytes -> Free floating hydrophytes -> Reed swamps -> Marsh meadows -> Scrubs -> Trees
explanation: The correct sequence of hydrarch succession is: Phytoplanktons -> Submerged plants -> Free-floating plants -> Reed swamp -> Marsh-meadow -> Scrub -> Forest (Trees).
